last_episode_to_air.name: Four To Ka One
last_episode_to_air.overview: You don't get to choose your childhood friends. Once you make them, you're stuck with them for life. And let's admit it, they're the best kind of friends to have. The group went on #TheHoliday of a lifetime. Had some amazing adventures and also made some terrible choices. And the best way to fix your mistakes is to have your squad by your side.

name: The Holiday
overview: Everyone needs friends who will get up randomly and say, "Chal na, holiday pe chalte hain!" And with Mehak's bachelorette as the perfect excuse, bags were packed and a plane straight to Mauritius was boarded. This holiday promises to be everything dreams are made of. Best friends, no plans, luxurious hotels, wild adventures. But does it all end well?
